Detailed Description

This class implements a cyclic buffer with a maximum number of elements. If the maximum is exceeded, the oldest element will be removed.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithElementSize: (int)  elementSize
maxElementCount: (int)  maxElementCount 

Initialize the buffer.

Parameters:
elementSize the size (in bytes) of one element.
maxElementCount the maximum number of elements to store.
Returns:
the initialized buffer.
- (void) pushElement: (const void *)  element  

Push an element into this buffer, if the buffer is full, the oldest element will be removed.

Parameters:
element the element that is to be added.

Property Documentation

- (int) elementCount [read, assign]

The number of elements currently in the buffer.

- (const void*) elements [read, assign]

The current elements, unordered.

- (int) elementSize [read, assign]

The size of elements in the buffer.

- (const void *) oldestElement [read, assign]

The value of the oldest element in the buffer.
